titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit former Members and elected officers of Congress from lobbying Congress at any time after leaving office, and for other purposes.
Halt Unchecked Member Benefits with Lobbying Elimination Act
Halt Unchecked Member Benefits with Lobbying Elimination Act
HUMBLE Act
HUMBLE Act
Halt Unchecked Member Benefits with Lobbying Elimination Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Rules, Ethics, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
